title: Investigate and Test Vintage UI Implementation Issues
description: Investigate current UI rendering issues, identify root causes of vintage theme not displaying correctly, and create comprehensive tests to verify all UI components

investigationAreas: Verify font loading (Crimson Text, Playfair Display, Merriweather)
Check CSS injection in content scripts
Inspect browser console for CSS errors
Test across different LinkedIn page types
testingRequirements: CSS loads without errors on all pages
No console errors related to styling
UI components are interactive and styled
Responsive design works at all breakpoints

checklist.item: Audit manifest.json for CSS file declarations and permissions
Verify Google Fonts loading mechanism for Crimson Text family
Test CSS injection in content scripts on various LinkedIn pages
Inspect browser developer tools for CSS loading errors
Verify vintage color variables are properly applied
Test popup interface styling and functionality
Verify responsive design at different breakpoints
Test across Chrome, Edge, and Firefox browsers
Create automated tests for UI component rendering
Document findings and create comprehensive test suite

testCriteria: CSS loads without errors on all pages
Fonts render correctly with proper fallbacks
Color palette displays properly (vintage-ink, vintage-sepia, vintage-sage, vintage-accent, vintage-paper)
No console errors related to styling or font loading
UI components are interactive and properly styled
Responsive design works at all breakpoints (mobile, tablet, desktop)
Modal overlays and popups maintain vintage theme consistency
Print styles work correctly for newspaper-like output

steps: Create unit tests for CSS loading verification
Build visual regression tests for UI components
Establish baseline for vintage theme consistency

acceptanceCriteria: Complete audit report of current UI state with identified issues
Comprehensive test suite covering all vintage UI components
Documentation of root causes for UI rendering problems
Verified font loading mechanism working correctly
CSS injection working properly across all LinkedIn page types
No console errors related to styling or fonts
Responsive design functioning at all breakpoints
Test automation in place for future UI validation
notes: This task focuses on systematic investigation and testing of the vintage UI implementation. The test-first approach ensures we have proper validation mechanisms in place before attempting fixes. Priority is on identifying root causes and establishing a reliable testing framework for UI consistency.
